forum.optOutPageTitle: Postkast ajab üle? Siit saad loobuda meie uudiskirjast.
forum.optOutPageDescription:
Mõistame, et eelistused muutuvad ning meil on kahju näha sind lahkumas. Kui sa ei soovi enam meie uudiskirja saada, siis kliki allolevale nupule. Seejärel ei saa sa meilt enam mingeid uudiseid või pakkumisi.

Sooviksime teada, kas on midagi, mida saaksime teha, et oma uudiskirja parandada või kas sul oleks mingit tagasisidet. Kui muudad oma meelt, siis võid tulevikus uue tellimuse teha!

Aitäh sulle sinu aja eest ning loodame, et näeme sind veel.

forum.dataProcessingModalContent:
Purpose

This policy outlines our approach to collecting, processing, and storing personal data for newsletter subscriptions in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). It ensures that individuals have full control over their data and understand how it is used.

Clear consent

We collect newsletter subscriptions only through a clear, affirmative opt-in process. Subscribers must actively check an unchecked box or click a dedicated "Agree" switch button to give consent. Pre-ticked checkboxes or implied consent are not used.

Data Minimization

We only collect the necessary data for sending newsletters: Email address (required).

Opt-out

Subscribers can opt-out at any time. Every newsletter includes an unsubscribe link that is easy to find and use.

Data Retention

Personal data is storedin our database only for the duration of the subscription. If a subscriber opts out, their email address and other personal data are deleted unless required by law or for legitimate purposes (e.g., maintaining a suppression list to avoid future emails).

Secure Data Handling

We ensure appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect subscribers’ data, such as: Encrypting data during transmission. Regular audits of our data storage and processing systems.
